name: beta-elastic
preInstallNotes:
This DC/OS Service is currently a beta candidate undergoing testing as part of a formal beta test program.

There may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation, or other discrepancies.

Default configuration requires 3 agent nodes each with: CPU: 4.0 | Memory: 9216MB | Disk: 13500MB

More specifically, each instance type requires:

Master node: 3 instances | 1.0 CPU | 2048 MB MEM | 1 2000 MB Disk

Data node: 2 instances | 1.0 CPU | 4096 MB MEM | 1 10000 MB Disk

Coordinator node: 1 instance | 1.0 CPU | 2048 MB MEM | 1 1000 MB Disk

Ingest node: No instances by default | 0.5 CPU | 2048 MB MEM | 1 2000 MB Disk

Contact Mesosphere before deploying this beta candidate service. Product support is available to approved participants in the beta test program.
postInstallNotes:
The DC/OS Elastic service is being installed!

	Documentation: https://docs.mesosphere.com/service-docs/beta-elastic/
	Issues: https://docs.mesosphere.com/support/
postUninstallNotes:
The DC/OS Elastic service is being uninstalled.

For DC/OS versions from 1.10 no further action is required. For older DC/OS versions follow the instructions at https://docs.mesosphere.com/service-docs/beta-elastic/uninstall to remove any persistent state if required.
